themes: insufficient space for project vision in applications
critique of siloed approach to art
key_phrases: more space on applications (at least Nexus) to share the vision for the project
opening up funding--not just to arts organizations but to organizations that would be paying artists for a more interdisciplinary endeavor
not such a silo-ing of art but seeing it as part of a larger tapestry
barriers_identified: limited opportunity to share project vision in applications
solutions_proposed: provide more space on applications (at least Nexus) to share the vision for the project
open up funding to organizations beyond arts organizations, including those paying artists for interdisciplinary work
reduce silo-ing of art and support a more integrated, interdisciplinary approach
